author: Gurashish
title: Auto grader problem
question: I am submitting my work through spd handin but auto-grader is not working. I am not receiving my grade in the email its successfully submitting through racket but still i am not receiving my grade in the mail.
instructor_answer:
which @assignment is giving you trouble? I see this in the log:
